name: Peter
overview: Peter is a French language "catch-it" game for the Commodore 64. This game was developed by Manfredi Dominico and published in the following: - Hebdogiciel N°138 (06.06.1986) - Hebdogiciel N°139 (13.06.1986) In the game, you play the titular character who has to look after an egg farm all on his own. The goal of the game is to catch the eggs laid by three hens situated at the top of the screen. Not as easy as it looks. Peter has to catch up with the help of a pole, the eggs that hens on a perch lay despite common sense. Woe to our friend if one of the eggs touches the ground.
